definition: Altair (star)/Cowherd of the folk tale Cowherd and Weaving maid 牛郎織女|牛郎织女
to lead along/to pull (an animal on a tether)/(bound form) to involve/to draw in
ox/cow/bull/CL:條|条[tiao2],頭|头[tou2]/newton (abbr. for 牛頓|牛顿[niu2 dun4])/(slang) awesome

sentences.english: Altair is not as bright as Vega and Deneb.
sentences.chinese: 牽牛星與織女和天津四相比，光亮度還是略爲遜色。

sentences.english: It is a custom for Chinese to watch the Altair and Vega on the chairs.
sentences.chinese: 七夕節坐着仰望牽牛星和織女星是中國人的一個習俗。
